column2: Three simulated datasets containing data on personal demographics and diabetes-related factors for a sample of the world's population. Used for R teaching purposes.
sequential ID number of the person

column4: ace; bi; hetero; homo; NA; other
column5: "ace": asexual; "bi": bisexual; "hetero": heterosexual; "homo": homosexual; "NA": missing value; "other": other sexual orientation

column4: africa; asia; europe; n_america; oceania; s_america
column5: africa: Africa; asia: Asia; europe: Europe; n_america: North America; oceania: Oceania; s_america: South America
NA: missing value; "omni": omnivorous; "pescatar": pescatarian; "vegan": vegan; "vegetar": vegetarian
NA: missing value; "none": exercise less than once a week; "sporadic": exercises 1-2 times a week; "regular": exercises >2 times a week

column2: mean weekly duration of physical exercise

column5: 0: able-bodied; 1: mildly disabled; 2: severely disabled; 999: missing value
